trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when e-mail is sent using an <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"></xref> and cannot be delivered to all recipients.
The <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException.InnerExceptions%2A> property contains the exceptions received while attempting to send e-mail.
The e-mail might have been successfully delivered to some of the recipients.
Initializes an empty instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.String"></xref>.
The exception message.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref> class from the specified instances of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> classes.
This constructor implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface for the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException> class.

A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance that contains the information required to serialize the new <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref> instance.

A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> that contains the source of the serialized stream that is associated with the new <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref> instance.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.String"></xref> and inner <xref href="System.Exception"></xref>.
The exception message.
The inner exception.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.String"></xref> and array of type <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"></xref>.
The exception message.
The array of recipients with delivery errors.

Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance with the data that is needed to serialize the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref>.
Gets one or more <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"></xref>s that indicate the e-mail recipients with SMTP delivery errors.
An array of type <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"></xref> that lists the recipients with delivery errors.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref> class from the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> instances.
This constructor implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface for the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException> class.
